Mercury::IrregularChannels

Mercury::IrregularChannels Class Reference

This class is used to store irregular channels and manages their resends. More...

Public Member Functions

void addIfNecessary (Channel &channel)
 This method remembers this channel for resend checking if it is irregular and is not already stored.

Protected Member Functions

iterator & channelIter (Channel &channel) const
 This method must return a reference to the Channel's iterator that stores its location in this collection.
float defaultPeriod () const
 This method must return the default check period for this collection, and will be used in the first call to addIfNecessary if no period has been set previously.

Detailed Description

This class is used to store irregular channels and manages their resends.

Member Function Documentation

This method remembers this channel for resend checking if it is irregular and is not already stored.

Reimplemented from Mercury::MonitoredChannels.

float Mercury::IrregularChannels::defaultPeriod (  )  const [protected, virtual]

This method must return the default check period for this collection, and will be used in the first call to addIfNecessary if no period has been set previously.

Implements Mercury::MonitoredChannels.
